Germantown Parkway, Suite #254Memphis, TN, 38133 Yorktown Shopping Center 203 Yorktown Shopping Center, FC-3Lombard, IL, 60148 Find a Sarku Japan Near You Looking for fresh, made-to-order Japanese food nearby? Use our Sarku Japan store locator to find the closest restaurant to you. With more than 170 locations across 34 states, plus over 30 in Colombia, Sarku Japan has become the go-to spot for quick, fresh and flavorful meals prepared right in front of our guests. Whether you‚Äôre searching ‚ÄúSarku Japan near me‚Äù or planning a visit to a mall or shopping center, chances are there‚Äôs a location not too far away. Each restaurant offers our signature Chicken Teriyaki, cooked hot off the grill with fresh vegetables, rice or noodle, and our famous Teriyaki sauce. We also offer Beef and Shrimp Teriyaki, Sushi and Bento Boxes. From busy food courts in California and Florida to standalone street locations in New York and Cleveland and military bases across the U.S., our stores are designed to bring the energy and flavor of teppanyaki cooking to your neighborhood. Finding a Sarku Japan address is simple. Just enter your city, ZIP code, or address in the search box above and browse through available options. The locator makes it easy to discover exact store details, from street addresses to operating hours, so you can pick the most convenient restaurant for dine-in, takeout, or online ordering. Since opening the very first store in Boston back in 1987, Sarku Japan has continued to grow while staying true to its Kaizen philosophy of continuous improvement. No matter which location you visit, you can expect the same dedication to quality ingredients, freshly grilled meals, and friendly service that has made us a favorite for millions of customers.

Chicken Teriyaki What we‚Äôre famous for!
